activejobs.title: Frontend Developer
activejobs.description: A Frontend Developer at Swiggy typically develops and maintains the user interface for Swiggy's web applications, focusing on creating scalable and responsive experiences. They work with technologies like JavaScript, React, and other UI frameworks, aiming to deliver a smooth and delightful user experience.

activejobs.title: Full Stack Developer
activejobs.description: A Full Stack Developer at Flipkart is responsible for building and maintaining the entire stack of an application, from the user interface (front-end) to the server-side logic and databases (back-end). This role involves developing features, solving problems, and collaborating with other teams to improve the online platform.

activejobs.title: Frontend Developer
activejobs.description: A Frontend Developer at Flipkart is responsible for translating designs and user interface specifications into functional, high-performing web and mobile applications. This role involves building reusable code, optimizing applications for speed and scalability, and ensuring the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs. Frontend Developers at Flipkart work with technologies like HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and potentially JavaScript frameworks such as React, Angular, or Vue.

activejobs.title: Frontend
activejobs.description: A typical Microsoft Frontend Developer job description involves building and optimizing user interfaces for web applications using technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and potentially frameworks like Angular, React, or Vue. This role also includes ensuring responsive design, optimizing for performance, and collaborating with other engineers and designers.

activejobs.title: Full Stack Web Developer
activejobs.description: Oppo is seeking a talented and passionate Full Stack Web Developer to join our growing digital products team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining cutting-edge web applications that power Oppo's global digital ecosystem. Working closely with product managers, designers, and engineers, you will help create seamless user experiences that reflect Oppo's innovation and design principles.

company.company_about: Google is an American multinational technology company that specializes in Internet-related services and products, including a search engine, online advertising technologies, cloud computing, software, and hardware. It is a subsidiary of Alphabet Inc.

Amazon is an American multinational technology company known for its diverse operations in e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and AI. It is the world's largest online retailer and a major cloud service provider, operating in over 20 countries. The company's main focus areas include e-commerce, cloud computing, digital streaming, and AI.

Swiggy is an Indian online food ordering and delivery company. Founded in 2014, Swiggy is headquartered in Bangalore and operates in more than 580 Indian cities, as of July 2023.[4] Besides food delivery, the platform also provides quick commerce services under the name Swiggy Instamart, and same-day package deliveries with Swiggy Genie.
company.company_location: Swiggy Limited (Formerly known as Bundl Technologies Private Limited & Swiggy Private Limited) No. 55 Sy No 8 to 14 I & J Block – Ground Floor, Embassy Tech Village | Outer Ring Road, Devarbisanahalli,  Bengaluru – 560103

company.company_about: Flipkart is a prominent Indian e-commerce company, founded in 2007, that operates a large online marketplace and has a strong presence in India's digital commerce sector. It's known for offering a wide variety of products across various categories, including electronics, fashion, home essentials, and groceries. Flipkart is also a part of the Flipkart Group, which includes other companies like Myntra, Flipkart Health+, and Cleartrip.
company.company_location: Buildings Alyssa, Begonia & Clover, Embassy Tech Village, Outer Ring Road, Devarabeesanahalli Village, Bengaluru – 560103, Karnataka, India

company.company_about: Microsoft Corporation is an American multinational technology company founded in 1975 by Bill Gates and Paul Allen, headquartered in Redmond, Washington. It is the world's largest vendor of computer software and a leading provider of cloud computing services.

Oppo is a Chinese consumer electronics and mobile communications company headquartered in Dongguan, Guangdong. It is known for its smartphones, Blu-ray players, and other electronic devices, and is a subsidiary of BBK Electronics.
